english.segment1: Salvation came to us. Now we are free forever. Made alive by the Savior's touch. Now death can't hold us under. Right here, right now, come bring Him adoration Rise up, sing out, this song of joy and freedom
english.segment2: We have seen the Son. Jesus, risen One. His light came down to us. Now we're alive and running to the world
english.segment3: Beauty revealed to us. Our eyes are wide with wonder. Caught by the brightness of. The glory of the Father. Our eyes, have not seen, something so captivating We'll go, where You lead, to the ends of the earth proclaiming
english.segment4: There is none shining brighter. Than the Son of the Father. Who has come to bring freedom. To the heart of man
english.segment5: You shine brighter than the brightest light that the world could show
